name: One Last Letter
description:
It tells the story of an old man who wants to finish his last letter before he dies. Adding time to finish his writing is vital, so he will have to go around the house looking for medicine and various other things, trying to prolong his life.

 The hands of this old man have so much to write. Try to find out what he keeps in his old heart.

It’s a first version of the build. We want to continue polishing the game and correcting bugs! any review is great for us! 

Changelog V1 06/04/22:

  • Workable Resize: Insanity bar UI, item counters, insanity bar feedback image
  • Resize viable: Dialogs (The bed dialog trigger now works but the dialog is not deactivated after reading. There is more to solve about this)
  • Button instructions and credits fixed
  • Minor adjustments to colliders (there are still more to fix)
